Author: mole99
Content:
For the analog layout, do you want to use magic or KLayout?

gf180mcu has PCells for both. However, the KLayout PCells require a more complex setup due to the use of GDSFactory.

Author: vks_007
Content: I will prefer magic as have worked on it earlier for few designs but open for klayout also.

Author: vks_007
Content: What about schematic, simulation, lvs steps? Is it similar to as for sky130?

Author: mole99
Content:
Yes, it's pretty much the same. I would recommend installing the latest PDK via ciel (https://github.com/fossi-foundation/ciel) and taking a look at the tool-specific setup in gf180mcuD/libs.tech/*.

You can then ask any specific questions here.
